com.martinandersson.javaee.cdi.scope.application

Class ApplicationScopedConcurrencyTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.martinandersson.javaee.cdi.scope.application.ApplicationScopedConcurrencyTest

  • public class ApplicationScopedConcurrencyTest
extends Object
    Unlike the EJB specification, the CDI specification doesn't say a thing about multithreading semantics of the CDI singleton.

    Results: For WildFly and GlassFish, the CDI singleton proxy do not serialize concurrent calls.

    Warning! GlassFish takes about a full minute on my machine to execute this test. WildFly 8.1.0 take 5 seconds =)

    Author:
    Martin Andersson (webmaster at martinandersson.com)
